projects

some of the projects I have worked on

research

Generalized Robot Tool Framework
CogRob | CRI | UCSD

Research Project in developing a generalized framework for robot tool improvization using affordances
Humanoid Robot Teleoperation
RBCCPS, IISc

Development of teleoperation of a robot humanoid nurse towards ANA Xprize Avatar challenge
Monocular Visual Odometry
RBCCPS, IISc

Research Project to explore Monocular VO, its challenges and applications for autonomous navigation
Analysis of Financial Filings
F&A Dept | IIMB

Textual Data Science analysis for a project to develop a new quality measure.

team

Project Jatayu | RVCE

Building drones at Project Jatayu, capable of object recognition and autonomy.

personal/fun

Writing python bindings for a few C++ projects, for easier prototyping
